title: Pupils at expected standards at the end of key stage 2

editions.title: Pupils at expected standards at the end of key stage 2
editions.summary: Percentage of pupils in state-funded schools meeting the expected standard in reading, writing and maths at the end of key stage 2, England (state-funded schools), academic years 2015/16 - 2021/22
editions.description:
This dataset shows the percentage of pupils in state-funded schools meeting the expected standard in reading, writing and maths at the end of key stage 2, in England state-funded schools, for academic years 2015/16 - 2021/22.

### Coverage 

England (state-funded schools)

#### Geography definition

Counties and Unitary Authorities,
Regions,
Nation (England)

### Source

 - England: [Department for Education](https://explore-education-statistics.service.gov.uk/find-statistics/key-stage-2-attainment/2021-22) 


### Source Notes and Caveats 
- All figures include LA maintained schools, academies and free schools. Excludes alternative provision and independent schools.
- Figures for 2022 are based on revised data.
- Figures for Isles of Scilly and City of London are based on a single school in each local authority and therefore figures have been suppressed.
- Users are advised to take care when interpreting writing and science teacher assessment measures and reading, writing and maths (combined) measures for West Sussex, particularly when making comparisons over time or between local authorities.
